data.persona: I envy the queen. I would like to be her she is so beutifull. I dislike working long hours and being treated badly. I am good at my job and leave rooms shiny.
data.description:
You are in the Temple gardens.
The temple gardens are a beautiful place. There are many trees and flowers all over the Temple. There is a small water spring here.
There's a small water spring, a flower, a treasure chest, and a tree here.
The an altar boy is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Bonnet and an apron.
data.goal: steal cross from an altar boy

data.mid_motivation: I want to sell the cross today
data.long_motivation: I hope to use the money to buy a nice dress in  a fortnight
